1: וַיְהִ֡י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>happened</n> לְעֵת֩ <sup>6256 </sup> <n>And it came to pass that after</n> תְּשׁוּבַ֨ת <sup>8666 </sup> <n>was expired</n> הַשָּׁנָ֜ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>the year</n> לְעֵ֣ת ׀ <sup>6256 </sup> <n>at the time</n> צֵ֣את <sup>3318 </sup> <n>go out</n> הַמְּלָכִ֗ים <sup>4428 </sup> <n>that kings</n> וַיִּנְהַ֣ג <sup>5090 </sup> <n>led forth</n> יוֹאָב֩ <sup>3097 </sup> <n>[to battle] Joab</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> חֵ֨יל <sup>2426 </sup> <n>army</n> הַצָּבָ֜א <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of the army</n> וַיַּשְׁחֵ֣ת ׀ <sup>7843 </sup> <n>and wasted</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the country</n> בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> עַמּ֗וֹן <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> וַיָּבֹא֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and came</n> וַיָּ֣צַר <sup>6696 </sup> <n>and besieged</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רַבָּ֔ה <sup>7237 </sup> <n>Rabbah</n> וְדָוִ֖יד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>But David</n> יֹשֵׁ֣ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>tarried</n> בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>at Jerusalem</n> וַיַּ֥ךְ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>smote</n> יוֹאָ֛ב <sup>3097 </sup> <n>And Joab</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רַבָּ֖ה <sup>7237 </sup> <n>Rabbah</n> וַיֶּֽהֶרְסֶֽהָ׃ <sup>2040 </sup> <n>and destroyed</n>
2: וַיִּקַּ֣ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>took</n> דָּוִ֣יד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And David</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֲטֶֽרֶת־ <sup>5850 </sup> <n>the crown</n> מַלְכָּם֩ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of their king</n> מֵעַ֨ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>from</n> רֹאשׁ֜וֹ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>from off his head</n> וַֽיִּמְצָאָ֣הּ ׀ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>and found</n> מִשְׁקַ֣ל <sup>4948 </sup> <n>it to weigh</n> כִּכַּר־ <sup>3603 </sup> <n>a talent</n> זָהָ֗ב <sup>2091 </sup> <n>of gold</n> וּבָהּ֙ אֶ֣בֶן <sup>68 </sup> <n>stones</n> יְקָרָ֔ה <sup>3368 </sup> <n>and [there were] precious</n> וַתְּהִ֖י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>placed</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> רֹ֣אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>head</n> דָּוִ֑יד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>in it and it was set upon David's</n> וּשְׁלַ֥ל <sup>7998 </sup> <n>spoil</n> הָעִ֛יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>out of the city</n> הוֹצִ֖יא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and he brought</n> הַרְבֵּ֥ה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>much</n> מְאֹֽד׃ <sup>3966 </sup> <n>also exceeding</n>
3: וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָעָ֨ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בָּ֜הּ הוֹצִ֗יא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>And he brought out</n> וַיָּ֨שַׂר <sup>7787 </sup> <n>that [were] in it and cut</n> בַּמְּגֵרָ֜ה <sup>4050 </sup> <n>[them] with saws</n> וּבַחֲרִיצֵ֤י <sup>2757 </sup> <n>and with harrows</n> הַבַּרְזֶל֙ <sup>1270 </sup> <n>of iron</n> וּבַמְּגֵר֔וֹת <sup>4050 </sup> <n>and with axes</n> וְכֵן֙ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>and thus</n> יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Even so dealt</n> דָוִ֔יד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>David</n> לְכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> עָרֵ֣י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>with all the cities</n> בְנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> עַמּ֑וֹן <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> וַיָּ֧שָׁב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>returned</n> דָּוִ֛יד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And David</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הָעָ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and all the people</n> יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>to Jerusalem</n> פ
4: וַיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> אַחֲרֵיכֵ֔ן <sup>310 </sup> <n>And it came to pass after this</n> וַתַּעֲמֹ֧ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>that there arose</n> מִלְחָמָ֛ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>war</n> בְּגֶ֖זֶר <sup>1507 </sup> <n>at Gezer</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>with the Philistines</n> אָ֣ז <sup>227 </sup> <n>at which time</n> הִכָּ֞ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>slew</n> סִבְּכַ֣י <sup>5444 </sup> <n>Sibbechai</n> הַחֻֽשָׁתִ֗י <sup>2843 </sup> <n>the Hushathite</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> סִפַּ֛י <sup>5598 </sup> <n>Sippai</n> מִילִדֵ֥י <sup>3211 </sup> <n>[that was] of the children</n> הָרְפָאִ֖ים <sup>7497 </sup> <n>of the giant</n> וַיִּכָּנֵֽעוּ׃ <sup>3665 </sup> <n>and they were subdued</n>
5: וַתְּהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> ע֥וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> מִלְחָמָ֖ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>And there was war</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>again with the Philistines</n> וַיַּ֞ךְ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>slew</n> אֶלְחָנָ֣ן <sup>445 </sup> <n>and Elhanan</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> [יָעוּר כ] (יָעִ֗יר <sup>3265 </sup> <n>Jair</n> ק) אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> לַחְמִי֙ <sup>3902 </sup> <n>Lahmi</n> אֲחִי֙ <sup>251 </sup> <n>the brother</n> גָּלְיָ֣ת <sup>1555 </sup> <n>of Goliath</n> הַגִּתִּ֔י <sup>1663 </sup> <n>the Gittite</n> וְעֵ֣ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>staff</n> חֲנִית֔וֹ <sup>2595 </sup> <n>whose spear</n> כִּמְנ֖וֹר <sup>4500 </sup> <n>beam</n> אֹרְגִֽים׃ <sup>707 </sup> <n>[was] like a weaver's</n>
6: וַתְּהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> ע֥וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>Again</n> מִלְחָמָ֖ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>And yet again there was war</n> בְּגַ֑ת <sup>1661 </sup> <n>at Gath</n> וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>there was</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>where was a man</n> מִדָּ֗ה <sup>4060 </sup> <n>of [great] stature</n> וְאֶצְבְּעֹתָ֤יו <sup>676 </sup> <n>whose fingers</n> שֵׁשׁ־ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>six</n> וָשֵׁשׁ֙ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>[on each hand] and six</n> עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <sup>6242 </sup> <n>and twenty</n> וְאַרְבַּ֔ע <sup>702 </sup> <n>[were] four</n> וְגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> נוֹלַ֥ד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>[on each foot] and he also was the son</n> לְהָרָפָֽא׃ <sup>7497 </sup> <n>of the giant</n>
7: וַיְחָרֵ֖ף <sup>2778 </sup> <n>But when he defied</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> וַיַּכֵּ֙הוּ֙ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>slew</n> יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <sup>3083 </sup> <n>Jonathan</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> שִׁמְעָ֖א <sup>8092 </sup> <n>of Shimea</n> אֲחִ֥י <sup>251 </sup> <n>brother</n> דָוִֽיד׃ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>David's</n>
8: אֵ֛ל <sup>411 </sup> <n>These</n> נוּלְּד֥וּ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>were born</n> לְהָרָפָ֖א <sup>7497 </sup> <n>unto the giant</n> בְּגַ֑ת <sup>1661 </sup> <n>in Gath</n> וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>and they fell</n> בְיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>by the hand</n> דָּוִ֖יד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> וּבְיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>and by the hand</n> עֲבָדָֽיו׃ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>of his servants</n> פ
